channel.title: Getting Started with ActivityPub in PHP
channel.description:
> I read this, but I actually understood less by reading more :smiley:
I hear ya, in another context (PHP) it's taking me a lot of study to start to get a handle on what all's involved. Not Rails-specific, but some more places I've found useful as I try to understand ActivityPub and how to implement support for it:
* [FunkWhale Federation](https://docs.funkwhale.audio/federation/index.html) * [What is ActivityPub?](https://blog.moodle.net/2018/what-is-activitypub/) (MoodleNet) * [Video intro to WriteFreely fediverse integration](https://video.writeas.org/videos/watch/cc55e615-d204-417c-9575-7b57674cc6f3) * [ActivityPub as it has been understood](https://flak.tedunangst.com/post/ActivityPub-as-it-has-been-understood)--includes lots of relevant links. * [LibreLounge](https://librelounge.org) podcast * [Episode 12: ActivityPub Part 1](https://librelounge.org/episodes/episode-12-activitypub-part-1.html) * [Episode 17: ActivityPub Part 2](https://librelounge.org/episodes/episode-17-activitypub-part-2.html) * [Episode 20: ActivityPub Part 3](https://librelounge.org/episodes/episode-20-activitypub-part-3.html)
